0: Donald Trump Hollywood Walk Star Obliterated On Camera by Vandal NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Donald Trump's Hollywood Walk Star Obliterated On Camera by Vandal NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Donald Trump's star on the Hollywood Blvd Walk of Fame is completely destroyed after someone took a pickax to it ... and LAPD is on the case. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Law enforcement sources tell us Trump's star was smashed apart early Wednesday morning. We're told the vandal posed as a construction worker to fool anyone walking past while they did the damage. Cops took a vandalism report, but haven't made any arrests.
